entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Rigolet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:31 PM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 20. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 15. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023
